Package mvc.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GraphicsStockView
    The GraphicsStockView interface defines operations and methods for graphical user interfaces (views) for the stock program.
    Interaction
    An interaction with the user consists of some input to send the program and some output to expect.
    TextStockView
    The TextStockView interface represents the handling of displaying results, menus, any other messages to the user/system.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdvancedTextStockView
    The AdvancedTextStockView extends the SimpleTextStockView and overrides the portfolioMenu method to show the user the new key-binds for advanced portfolio operations.
    InputInteraction
    Represents a user providing the program with an input.
    MockTestsForOutputs
    Class to test outputs of program.
    PrintInteraction
    Represents the printing of a sequence of lines to output.
    SimpleGraphicsStockView
    The SimpleGraphicsStockView class in an implementation on the GraphicsStock view interface and handles to view output with a GUI.
    SimpleTextStockView
    The mvc.view.TextStockView class represent the view, in the MVC architecture of this program.
